Docs.summary: A .NET binding to the GnuPG Made Easy (GpgME) API.

remarks.para: This class library uses P/Invoke to call the Libgpgme API functions and wraps them into .Net objects. The wrapper classes are written in C#.

Currently supported systems (tested):
Operating System System library
Windows XP/Vista (32bit) GPG4WIN version 1.1.4
Ubuntu Linux (32bit/64bit) libgpgme 1.2.0
